flawed_nl_solution:
It will take 3 * 5 = <<3*5=15>>15 minutes to brush his cats.
All together, it will take 45 + 60 + 30 + 15 = <<45+60+30+15=150>>150 minutes to clean his apartment.
In three hours, there are 60 * 3 = <<60*3=810>>810 minutes.
Thus, he will have 810 - 150 = <<810-150=660>>660 minutes of free time remaining.
#### 660

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
